Name: Sevinne, the Chronoclasm
Text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Sevinne, the Chronoclasm.\nWhenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard each turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

Name: Kadena, Slinking Sorcerer
Text: The first face-down creature spell you cast each turn costs {3} less to cast.\nWhenever a face-down creature enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

Name: Ghired, Conclave Exile
Text: When Ghired, Conclave Exile enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample.\nWhenever Ghired attacks, populate. The token enters the battlefield tapped and attacking. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

Name: Anje Falkenrath
Text: Haste\n{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.\nWhenever you discard a card, if it has madness, untap Anje Falkenrath.
